name: CAP_PAY_EL_DETAILS
description: This table stores additional details involving the selection of rate elements used in a capitation transaction.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DETAIL_KEY_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: This key corresponds with the rate element's group line in related-multi item DTX 3515 (column GROUP_LINE from table CAP_PAY_EL_IDENT).

columns.name: DETAIL_KEY_VALUE_LINE
columns.description: This key corresponds with the rate element's value line in related-multi item DTX 3515 (column VALUE_LINE from table CAP_PAY_EL_IDENT).

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID
columns.description: Stores the refinement table used to compute the rate element.

columns.name: REFINEMENT_LOOKUP_TABLE_ID_RATE_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the capitation rate table.

columns.name: MATCHED_CVG_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the matched coverage attribute used to select the value for the rate element.

columns.name: MATCHED_RIDER_PLAN_ID_BEN_PACKAGE_NAME
columns.description: *** Deprecated *** In table CLARITY_EPP_OT, the column BEN_PACKAGE_NAME (CMK .2) has been deprecated.  This column already exists as BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM (CMK .2) in table CL_CMK. To look up the deprecated column's value after the Clarity Compass upgrade, join column CLARITY_EPP_OT.BEN_PACKAGE_ID to table CL_CMK column BENEFIT_PACKAGE_ID and get the BENEFIT_PACKAGE_NM value.   The name of the benefit package for this benefit plan.The ID of the benefit package is in the column BEN_PACKAGE_ID.

columns.name: MATCHED_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the matched rule used to select the value for the rate element.

columns.name: SELECTED_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the value selected for the rate element from a matched rate group in the lookup table.
